idea-plugin.name: Spawnia Keymap
idea-plugin.description:
The preferred Intellij IDE keymap of Benedikt Franke
This plugin is essentially a workaround, allowing me to share my preferred keymap across multiple Intellij based IDEs on multiple devices. See: - https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-184607/Can-not-share-custom-keymap-configuration - https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-181599 It is designed for my personal use and thus does not include documentation.
I will probably delete it once Jetbrains provides a working and supported way of sharing keymaps.
